document.full_text: tokyo's usually bustling central districts were deserted on saturday after the country's worst earthquake and a tsunami devastated the north of the country, and the few in bars and restaurants were glued to television coverage of the disaster.
document.title: tokyo residents worry, streets deserted after disaster
lines_and_colors: tokyo's usually bustling central districts were deserted on saturday after the country's worst earthquake and a tsunami devastated the north of the country, and the few in bars and restaurants were glued to television coverage of the disaster.
